meta.description: Determine the number of small and large butcher shops to build to minimize the total number of shops while meeting production and worker constraints.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Number of hot dogs each shop type can produce per day.

params.name: worker_requirement
params.description: Number of workers required for each shop type.

params.name: min_hot_dogs
params.description: Minimum number of hot dogs to produce per day.

vars.name: num_shops
vars.description: Number of each type of butcher shop to build.

objective.name: min_total_shops
objective.description: Minimize the total number of butcher shops.

constraints.name: production_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 hot dogs are produced per day.

constraints.name: worker_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total number of workers does not exceed 30.
